summary: Tested plant-growing game features: Reward Type dropdown (4 options with target days), Manifestation dropdown (5 options with plant types), plant preview in dialog, game start with manifestation data, and water plant functionality. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Some database items (retreats, classes, products) have null IDs which prevents them from being selected as rewards. This is a data quality issue from previous test data creation.
The Plant My Seed button correctly validates that both reward ID and manifestation are selected before enabling.
seed_data_creation: Created new plant game with Product reward (Test Tea) and Growth manifestation (Bamboo)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Plant game feature fully tested. Current admin user has active game with Bamboo plant (Growth manifestation), Test Tea reward, 5% growth, 28 days remaining. All 4 reward types (Class 60 days, Retreat 90 days, Product 28 days, Service 28 days) and all 5 manifestations (Abundance/Money Tree, Healing/Aloe Plant, Love/Rose Bush, Peace/Lavender, Growth/Bamboo) verified working.

features_tested.loyalty_page_loads: PASS - Page loads with tier info and game section
features_tested.start_growing_dialog: PASS - Dialog opens when clicking Start Growing button
features_tested.reward_type_dropdown: PASS - Shows all 4 options with target days: Class (60), Retreat (90), Product (28), Service (28)
features_tested.manifestation_dropdown: PASS - Shows all 5 options with plant types: Abundance (Money Tree), Healing (Aloe Plant), Love (Rose Bush), Peace (Lavender), Growth (Bamboo)
features_tested.plant_preview_in_dialog: PASS - Shows plant image and name when manifestation selected
features_tested.target_days_info_box: PASS - Shows correct target days based on reward type selection
features_tested.game_start_with_manifestation: PASS - Game created with manifestationId, manifestationName, plantType, plantImage
features_tested.plant_image_in_active_game: PASS - Shows manifestation plant image instead of emoji
features_tested.water_plant_button: PASS - Waters plant, adds 5% growth, shows cooldown timer

api_test_results.GET /api/game/reward-types: PASS - Returns 4 reward types with correct target days
api_test_results.GET /api/game/manifestations: PASS - Returns 5 manifestations with plant types and images
api_test_results.GET /api/game/plant: PASS - Returns current game with manifestation data
api_test_results.POST /api/game/plant/start: PASS - Creates game with manifestation fields
api_test_results.POST /api/game/plant/water: PASS - Waters plant and returns growth update
